title: Build error when using new communication code

content.raw:
We recently updated the subt repo (hg) and started using the new communication system.  We have a build error now because we include the subt_communication_model.h file from multiple cpp files and this leads to a linker error.  This can be easily fixed by changing the ostream operator to be "inline".  I am attaching a patch that fixes this (the patch was created at the subt root folder).  It can be applied as follows:

cd subt_ws/src/subt
patch -p0 < osrf_patch_fix_inline.patch

We are unable to submit pull requests, but we hope you'll treat this as one and let us know when this gets committed to the upstream repo.  Thanks!
